objects.text: • PREMIUM QUALITY • GIFT FOR HER • 6 MONTH WARRANTY

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a soft and elegant jewelry promotion layout with a feminine and premium appeal. The background uses a subtle gradient with circular highlights and soft decorative lines, adding a delicate visual texture. At the center is a circular highlight containing a high-quality product image (`product_image`) representing a pair of earrings. Positioned at the top are bold header (`heading`) and subheader (`subheading`) text fields, centrally aligned and styled with strong, modern fonts. On the right side of the center circle is a standout price label (`price`) encased within a vibrant accent circle. Below the product image lies a tagline (`tagline`) emphasizing product features. At the bottom-center, a call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta` label) invites users to take action. The overall composition is clean, balanced, and perfect for a luxury product focus.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Pink Gradient: `#FFE1E8` to `#FFCBD5`
- Deep Rose: `#8E2B47`
- Rose Accent: `#F1A3B1`, `#E77C8F`, `#E5A3B1`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Button Background: `#B93B5E`
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings, blending soft and elegant colors that evoke a sense of luxury and femininity. The primary color is a lustrous **rose gold** (#F4A7A7), which outlines the structure and adds warmth. Accents of **blush pink** (#FBB6B6) fill the petal-shaped sections, adding softness and sophistication. Bright **crystal white** (#FFFFFF) and **diamond sparkle** (#E5E5E5) are used for gem detailing, creating contrast and drawing attention through shine and clarity. These elements are harmoniously blended with subtle transitions between metal and stone, ensuring each component stands out while maintaining a cohesive, elegant look.
